project_descr: This project aims to secure the watershed services through Sustainable Land Management in the Ruvu and Zigi catchments. The project will build capacity and implement interventions for securing watershed and improving livelihoods.

outputs.output_descr: This project aims to secure the watershed services through Sustainable Land Management in the Ruvu and Zigi catchments (Eastern Arc Region), Tanzania

document_name: fINAL prodoc for securing watershed management through SLM
